entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
